required.name: Albania
required.note: Schengen visa covers entry.

required.name: Andorra
required.note: Schengen visa covers entry.

required.name: Azerbaijan
required.note: Visa on arrival is available providing an official invitation letter.

required.name: The Bahamas
required.note: Bahamas tourist visa is not required for US or Canada Resident card holder for a stay up to 30 days.

required.name: Belarus
required.note:
Visas are issued on arrival at the Minsk International Airport
if the support documents were submitted not later than 3 business days before expected date of arrival.

required.name: Belize
required.note: Visa not required for Holders of a valid multiple entry visa or Permanent Residents card holder issued by the USA.

required.name: Bhutan
required.note: e-visa is available

required.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a valid Schengen visa.

required.name: Burundi
required.note: Visa on arrival at Bujumbura Airport for max. of 1 month.

required.name: Cameroon
required.note: Pre-approved visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Canada
required.note: Visa not required for US permanent resident card Holders.

required.name: China
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available

required.name: Costa Rica
required.note: Visa waiver for passengers with multiple-entry valid visa issued by Canada, USA, Japan or Schengen Member State, maximum for 30 days.

required.name: Ivory Coast
required.note: Pre-arranged visa is available on arrival providing an invitation letter.

required.name: Cuba
required.note: No visa required, tourist card for maximum 30 days on arrival/prior to arrival

required.name: Dominica
required.note: Visa is not required for holders of a valid US, UK, Canada or a Schengen member State visa.

required.name: El Salvador
required.note: Visa not required for Holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Eritrea
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Ethiopia
required.note: Visa on arrival is available for those traveling as tourists or providing an invitation letter.

required.name: Ghana
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Guatemala
required.note: Visa waiver for passengers wit a valid visa issued by Canada, USA, or a Schengen Member State for maximum of 90 days.

required.name: Haiti
required.note: Visa not required for max. stay of 3 Months for Holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Honduras
required.note: Visa waiver for passengers with a visa valid for at least 6 months on arrival, issued by Canada, USA or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Jamaica
required.note: Visa waiver for passengers with a valid visa issued by Canada, USA, UK, or a Schengen Member State for maximum of 30 days.

required.name: Kazakhstan
required.note: Visa on arrival is available providing an invitation letter.

required.name: Kuwait
required.note: Visa on arrival for those traveling as tourists.

required.name: Liberia
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Republic of Macedonia
required.note: No visa required for holders of a multiple entry Schengen visa.

required.name: Malawi
required.note: Visa on arrival is available for 30 days.

required.name: Mexico
required.note: No visa required for those holding a valid US visa.

required.name: Mongolia
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Montenegro
required.note: Visa waiver for passengers with a valid visa issued by Canada, USA, UK or a Schengen Member State for 30 days.

required.name: Nigeria
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Panama
required.note: No visa required for holders of a valid US, Canada, Japan or Schengen Member State visa.

required.name: Qatar
required.note: E-visa is available.

required.name: Rwanda
required.note: E-visa is available.

required.name: Saint Kitts and Nevis
required.note: Visa is obtained online.

required.name: São Tomé and Príncipe
required.note: Visa is obtained online.

required.name: Serbia
required.note: Visa not required for holders of Schengen, US or UK visa or residence permits (max stay 90 days)

required.name: Syria
required.note: Pre-arranged visa on arrival is available.

required.name: Tunisia
required.note: Visa not required for passengers traveling on an organized tour.

required.name: Ukraine
required.note: Visa on arrival is available for maximum of 90 days providing an official invitation letter. Only at Kyiv and Odessa airports.

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: E-visas can be obtained. A 96-hour transit visa can be obtained on arrival at Dubai (DXB).

required.name: Vietnam
required.note:
Pre-arranged visa obtained online through travel agencies available at Hanoi, Ho Chi Minh City or Da Nang airports.
Phú Quốc without a visa for up to 30 days.

evisa.name: Antigua and Barbuda
evisa.note: Visa waiver for passengers with valid visa issued by Canada, USA, UK or Schengen Member State. Visa fee: USD-100, for max. of 30 days.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Turkey
evisa.note: e-Visa on arrival at e-Visa kiosks available as well. 30 days

on-arrival.name: Armenia
on-arrival.note: 120 days. Obtainable on arrival at Zvartnots International Airport or prior to travel online.

on-arrival.name: Bangladesh
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Visa is also obtainable online.

on-arrival.name: Cape Verde
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Djibouti
on-arrival.note: Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: Conditions apply. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Laos
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Lebanon
on-arrival.note: 1 month extendable for 2 additional months; granted free of charge at Beirut International Airport or any other port of entry if there is no Israeli visa or seal, holding a telephone number, an address in Lebanon, and a non refundable return or circle trip ticket.

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note: 30 days, must hold an invitation letter issued at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: East Timor
on-arrival.note: 30 days. Not available at all entry points.

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note: Determined at the port of entry.
